languages.text: "Наоборот — мне очень, очень надо, чтобы ты стоял{mf||а} столбом еще..." {n}Он театрально отщелкивает крышку хронометра.{/n} "Буквально секунду. Мой тебе дар, Вольный Торговец".

"On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Наоборот — мне очень, очень надо, чтобы ты стоял{mf||а} столбом еще..." {n}Он театрально отщелкивает крышку хронометра.{/n} "Буквально секунду. Мой тебе дар, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer for you to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."
"On the contrary — I would very much prefer for you to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

"On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

"On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: «Al contrario: preferiría que siguieras ahí plantad{mf|o|a} como un{mf||a} fantoche pompos{mf|o|a} durante exactamente...». {n}Abre su crono con un gesto melodramático.{/n} «... un segundo más. Disfruta de mi regalo, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario: preferiría que siguieras ahí plantad{mf|o|a} como un{mf||a} fantoche pompos{mf|o|a} durante exactamente...». {n}Abre su crono con un gesto melodramático.{/n} «... un segundo más. Disfruta de mi regalo, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “恰恰相反，我更希望你继续站在这里夸夸其谈，像个白痴一样。只要再等……”{n}他做了个浮夸的动作，按下了手里的计时器。{/n}“……再等一秒钟就好。我给你准备了一份礼物，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反，我更希望你继续站在这里夸夸其谈，像个白痴一样。只要再等……”{n}他做了个浮夸的动作，按下了手里的计时器。{/n}“……再等一秒钟就好。我给你准备了一份礼物，行商浪人。”

languages.text: « Au contraire, si vous pouviez me faire le plaisir de rester {mf|planté|plantée} là comme une buse pendant encore... {n}Il ouvre le boîtier de son chrono d'un geste théâtral.{/n} ... une petite seconde. Cadeau, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, c'est la maison qui régale. »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire, si vous pouviez me faire le plaisir de rester {mf|planté|plantée} là comme une buse pendant encore... {n}Il ouvre le boîtier de son chrono d'un geste théâtral.{/n} ... une petite seconde. Cadeau, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, c'est la maison qui régale. »

languages.text: 「逆だ―私はお前が偉そうな愚か者のようにそこに立ち続けていることをとても好ましく思っている」{n}彼は彼のクロノをクリックして芝居がかったように開ける。{/n}「もう少し。お前へのギフトだ、ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「逆だ―私はお前が偉そうな愚か者のようにそこに立ち続けていることをとても好ましく思っている」{n}彼は彼のクロノをクリックして芝居がかったように開ける。{/n}「もう少し。お前へのギフトだ、ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: "Aksine... O aptal, kibirli duruşunla yerinden kıpırdamamanı tercih ederim." {n}Teatral bir şekilde kronosunu kontrol ediyor.{/n} "...Son bir saniye. Benden sana hediye Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Aksine... O aptal, kibirli duruşunla yerinden kıpırdamamanı tercih ederim." {n}Teatral bir şekilde kronosunu kontrol ediyor.{/n} "...Son bir saniye. Benden sana hediye Hür Tacir."

languages.text: "Ganz im Gegenteil – Ich würde es vorziehen, Ihr würdet hier weiter herumstehen wie {mf|ein aufgeblasener Narr|eine aufgeblasene Närrin}. Nur für ... {n}Er öffnet theatralisch sein Chrono.{/n} "... eine weitere Sekunde. "Mein Geschenk für Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary — I would very much prefer that you continue to stand there like a pompous fool for just..." {n}He clicks his chrono open theatrically.{/n} "...one more second. My gift to you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz im Gegenteil – Ich würde es vorziehen, Ihr würdet hier weiter herumstehen wie {mf|ein aufgeblasener Narr|eine aufgeblasene Närrin}. Nur für ... {n}Er öffnet theatralisch sein Chrono.{/n} "... eine weitere Sekunde. "Mein Geschenk für Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
